mapper.sql: f_measure_check_id, order_id, check_item, cdate, measure_data, emp_id, result, note
mapper.insert: insert into final_measuret_check (f_measure_check_id, order_id, check_item, cdate, measure_data, emp_id, result, note) values (#{fMeasureCheckId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orderId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{checkItem,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cdate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{measureData,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{empId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{result,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{note,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

f_measure_check_id,

mapper.update:
update final_measuret_check
order_id = #{orderId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
check_item = #{checkItem,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
cdate = #{cdate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
measure_data = #{measureData,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
emp_id = #{empId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
result = #{result,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
note = #{note,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where f_measure_check_id = #{fMeasureCheckId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update final_measuret_check set order_id = #{orderId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, check_item = #{checkItem,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, cdate = #{cdate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, measure_data = #{measureData,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, emp_id = #{empId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, result = #{result,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, note = #{note,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where f_measure_check_id = #{fMeasureCheckId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: SELECT final_measuret_check.f_measure_check_id as fMeasureCheckId, final_measuret_check.order_id as orderId, final_measuret_check.check_item as checkItem, final_measuret_check.cdate as cdate, final_measuret_check.measure_data as measureData, final_measuret_check.emp_id as empId, final_measuret_check.result as result, final_measuret_check.note as note, employee.emp_name as empName from final_measuret_check, employee where final_measuret_check.emp_id=employee.emp_id limit #{page} , #{rows}

SELECT final_measuret_check.f_measure_check_id as fMeasureCheckId, final_measuret_check.order_id as orderId, final_measuret_check.check_item as checkItem, final_measuret_check.cdate as cdate, final_measuret_check.measure_data as measureData, final_measuret_check.emp_id as empId, final_measuret_check.result as result, final_measuret_check.note as note, employee.emp_name as empName from final_measuret_check, employee where final_measuret_check.emp_id=employee.emp_id and final_measuret_check.f_measure_check_id like CONCAT('%',#{id},'%') limit #{page} , #{rows}
select count(*) from final_measuret_check where final_measuret_check.f_measure_check_id like CONCAT('%',#{id},'%')

SELECT final_measuret_check.f_measure_check_id as fMeasureCheckId, final_measuret_check.order_id as orderId, final_measuret_check.check_item as checkItem, final_measuret_check.cdate as cdate, final_measuret_check.measure_data as measureData, final_measuret_check.emp_id as empId, final_measuret_check.result as result, final_measuret_check.note as note, employee.emp_name as empName from final_measuret_check, employee where final_measuret_check.emp_id=employee.emp_id and final_measuret_check.order_id like CONCAT('%',#{orderId},'%') limit #{page} , #{rows}
select count(*) from final_measuret_check where final_measuret_check.order_id like CONCAT('%',#{orderId},'%')
